title: Bloomberg Markets: Galloway Says Tech Should Raise Standards
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Galloway Says Tech Should Raise Standards
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Scott Galloway\u0010Professor of Marketing\u0010NYU Stern School of Business\u0010Discussing Facebook, Google and Twitter representatives testifying at Senate Judiciary subcommittee panel on Russian meddling in the U.S. Election. \u0010 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
